alert.note: Alert for San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 9:47AM PDT until March 30 at 10:30AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern San Diego County in southwestern California... * Until 1030 AM PDT. * At 947 AM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oceanside, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oceanside, Vista, Valley Center, Fallbrook, eastern Camp Pendleton, Bonsall, Pala Indian Reservation, Hidden Meadows, Pauma Indian Reservation and Pauma Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
